extendedInfo.description: This newly improved Android Subway Surf app is designed for everyone! Great photo of  subway and fast speed trains!This game is easy yet super fun to play with. There are THREE games!Item 1 - Memory Game: A  test of memory. Play by matching same images in pairs. Find great images of surf trains!Item 2 - Puzzle Game : 10 most outstanding and wonderful photo of  Drag the pieces into the right place to recreate the original picture!Item 3 - Brick Game: Change or flip the block to fit into each other!It is a clasic 100 levels game. There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.Tips on Scoring:The more blocks you clear, the more score you will get.Other features : You can pause the game and resume later.We've put together the best collection of video of Subway Surfers cheats, miniature train, and outdoor model train set.
